verses.verse: <S%G3767>Wherefore<s%> laying <S%G659>aside<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2549>malice<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1388>guile<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5272>hypocrisies<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5355>envies<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> evil <S%G2636>speakings<s%>,

<S%G5613>As<s%> <S%G738>newborn<s%> <S%G1025>babes<s%>, <S%G1971>desire<s%> the <S%G97>sincere<s%> <S%G1051>milk<s%> of the <S%G3050>word<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may <S%G837>grow<s%> <S%G1722%G846>thereby<s%>:
If so <S%G1512>be<s%> ye have <S%G1089>tasted<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G5543>gracious<s%>.

<S%G4314>To<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G4334>coming<s%>, as unto a <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%>, <S%G593>disallowed<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1588>chosen<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, and <S%G1784>precious<s%>,

<S%G846>Ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2198>lively<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%>, are built <S%G3618>up<s%> a <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>, an <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2406>priesthood<s%>, to offer <S%G399>up<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%>, <S%G2144>acceptable<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1352>Wherefore<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> it is <S%G4023>contained<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1124>scripture<s%>, <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, I <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4622>Sion<s%> a chief <S%G204>corner<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%>, <S%G1588>elect<s%>, <S%G1784>precious<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2617>shall<s%> not <S%G3364>be<s%> <S%G2617>confounded<s%>.

Unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> he is <S%G5092>precious<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> unto them which be <S%G544>disobedient<s%>, the <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3618>builders<s%> <S%G593>disallowed<s%>, the <S%G3778>same<s%> is <S%G1096%G1519>made<s%> the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G1137>corner<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> a <S%G3037>stone<s%> of <S%G4348>stumbling<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4073>rock<s%> of <S%G4625>offence<s%>, even to them <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4350>stumble<s%> at the <S%G3056>word<s%>, being <S%G544>disobedient<s%>: <S%G1519%G3739>whereunto<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> they were <S%G5087>appointed<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> are a <S%G1588>chosen<s%> <S%G1085>generation<s%>, a <S%G934>royal<s%> <S%G2406>priesthood<s%>, an <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%>, a <S%G1519%G4047>peculiar<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%>; <S%G3704>that<s%> ye should shew <S%G1804>forth<s%> the <S%G703>praises<s%> of him who hath <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2298>marvellous<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%>:

<S%G3588>Which<s%> in time <S%G4218>past<s%> were <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G2992>people<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> are <S%G3568>now<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1653>had<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> obtained <S%G1653>mercy<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> have obtained <S%G1653>mercy<s%>.

Dearly <S%G27>beloved<s%>, I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3941>strangers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3927>pilgrims<s%>, abstain <S%G567>from<s%> <S%G4559>fleshly<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G4754>war<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G5590>soul<s%>;

<S%G2192>Having<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> <S%G2570>honest<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>: <S%G2443>that<s%>, <S%G1722%G3739>whereas<s%> they speak <S%G2635>against<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2555>evildoers<s%>, they <S%G1392>may<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> your <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, which they shall <S%G2029>behold<s%>, <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G1984>visitation<s%>.

<S%G3767><s%>Submit <S%G5293>yourselves<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2937>ordinance<s%> of <S%G442>man<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the Lord's <S%G2962>sake<s%>: whether it <S%G1535>be<s%> to the <S%G935>king<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5242>supreme<s%>;

<S%G1535>Or<s%> unto <S%G2232>governors<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> unto them that are <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519%G3303>for<s%> the <S%G1557>punishment<s%> of <S%G2555>evildoers<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> for the <S%G1868>praise<s%> of them that do <S%G17>well<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, that with well <S%G15>doing<s%> ye may put to <S%G5392>silence<s%> the <S%G56>ignorance<s%> of <S%G878>foolish<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>:

<S%G5613>As<s%> <S%G1658>free<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2192>using<s%> your <S%G1657>liberty<s%> <S%G5613>for<s%> a <S%G1942>cloke<s%> of <S%G2549>maliciousness<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.
<S%G5091>Honour<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men. <S%G25>Love<s%> the <S%G81>brotherhood<s%>. <S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>. <S%G5091>Honour<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%>.

<S%G3610>Servants<s%>, be <S%G5293>subject<s%> to your <S%G1203>masters<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%>; <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> to the <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1933>gentle<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G4646>froward<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> is <S%G5485>thankworthy<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> toward <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5297>endure<s%> <S%G3077>grief<s%>, <S%G3958>suffering<s%> <S%G95>wrongfully<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G2811>glory<s%> is it, <S%G1487>if<s%>, <S%G2532>when<s%> ye be <S%G2852>buffeted<s%> for your <S%G264>faults<s%>, ye shall take it <S%G5278>patiently<s%>? <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%>, when ye do <S%G15>well<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> for it, ye take it <S%G5278>patiently<s%>, <S%G5124>this<s%> is <S%G5485>acceptable<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1519>even<s%> <S%G5124>hereunto<s%> were ye <S%G2564>called<s%>: <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G5277>leaving<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> an <S%G5261>example<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> ye should <S%G1872>follow<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2487>steps<s%>:
<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> was <S%G1388>guile<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>:

<S%G3739>Who<s%>, when he was <S%G3058>reviled<s%>, <S%G486>reviled<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G486>again<s%>; when he <S%G3958>suffered<s%>, he <S%G546>threatened<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3860>committed<s%> himself to him that <S%G2919>judgeth<s%> <S%G1346>righteously<s%>:

<S%G3739>Who<s%> his own <S%G846>self<s%> <S%G399>bare<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> his <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G3586>tree<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2198>we<s%>, being <S%G581>dead<s%> to <S%G266>sins<s%>, should <S%G2198>live<s%> unto <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>: <S%G3739>by<s%> <S%G846>whose<s%> <S%G3468>stripes<s%> ye were <S%G2390>healed<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> ye <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> going <S%G4105>astray<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1994>are<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1994>returned<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> the <S%G4166>Shepherd<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1985>Bishop<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%>.
